question: Describe the histological features of different types of epithelial tissue and their locations in the human body.
Explain the structure and function of the different types of cartilage: hyaline elastic and fibrocartilage.
Describe the histological organization of the small intestine and how it relates to its absorptive function.
Explain the process of hematopoiesis and the different cell lineages derived from hematopoietic stem cells.
Describe the histological structure of the skin and the functions of its various layers.
